wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Rivett-Carnac, 2nd Baronet (10 August 1818 – 4 August 1883) was a member of the baronetage of the United Kingdom. He succeeded his father, Sir James Rivett-Carnac, 1st Baronet in 1846. He represented Lymington in the House of Commons as a Conservative from 1852 to 1860.

response: *Sir John Rivett-Carnac, 2nd Baronet; MP for Lymington (1852–1860)
